results.idea: Short-term momentum: 5-day return zscore
results.description: Combine price momentum with cross-sectional zscore. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using multiple fields? minimal (only close) to keep implementation short. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector). SUGGESTION3 not needed (close coverage high). SUGGESTION4: used high-user field 'close'. Kept implementation under operator/datafield limits. Confidence set to 0.65 because short momentum is robust but noisy.

results.idea: Volume surge momentum: 3d return weighted by volume zscore
results.description: Used multiple fields (close, volume) per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2 N/A. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). Preferred high-user fields (close, volume) per SUGGESTION4. Kept <7 operators and <=2 datafields. Confidence 0.6: extra signal over pure momentum but medium noise.

results.idea: Mean-reversion on intraday volatility vector avg
results.description: Used vector field (intraday_vol_vector) and wrapped with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2. SUGGESTION1 used two fields (close and intraday vector). If vector coverage low, apply ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3) — not required here. Confidence 0.55 due to microstructure noise.

results.idea: Earnings surprise continuation: post-earnings drift
results.description: Combined earnings_surprise and ts_returns(close). SUGGESTION1 applied. Because analyst/earnings fields can have sparse coverage, used ts_backfill(earnings_surprise,30) per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: earnings_surprise often high alphaCount. Kept operators low. Confidence 0.7: well-known drift.

results.idea: Analyst revision momentum
results.description: Used analyst_eps_revision and price returns (SUGGESTION1). Analyst fields can be sparse so applied ts_backfill(analyst_eps_revision,60) per SUGGESTION3. Applied SUGGESTION4 by preferring analyst fields with high userCount. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Implied vol mean-reversion
results.description: Combine option_implied_vol and recent realized return. SUGGESTION1 applied. If option_implied_vol coverage low, use ts_backfill(option_implied_vol,20) per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.5: vols mean-revert but timing uncertain.

results.idea: Short interest squeeze signal: rising short interest + positive returns
results.description: Used short_interest (sparse) with ts_backfill(short_interest,30) per SUGGESTION3 and close returns (SUGGESTION1). SUGGESTION4: short_interest often high alphaCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Liquidity breakout: bid-ask compression + volume spike
results.description: Used bidask_spread and volume (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Coverage of bidask may be lower so ts_backfill(bidask_spread,10) could be applied; here we assume adequate coverage. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Quality-weighted momentum: ROA * 12-week return
results.description: Combine fundamental quality (roa) with momentum (SUGGESTION1). Fundamental fields may be quarterly — used ts_backfill(roa,90) per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: choose widely used roa. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Value reversion: low PE rebound
results.description: Combine pe_ratio and short-term returns (SUGGESTION1). PE can be stale; used ts_backfill(pe_ratio,90). SUGGESTION4: pe widely used. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for volatility (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Used ts_returns(close,20) and ts_std_dev(ts_returns(close,20),20) in single-field time-series ops (SUGGESTION1 minimal). No extra datafields; coverage high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Seasonality: month-of-year momentum
results.description: Use ts_step to identify month indices and combine with returns (single datafield close). SUGGESTION1 partially applied. No coverage issues. Confidence 0.45 because seasonal effects weaker.

results.idea: Reversal after large intraday range vector
results.description: Use intraday_price_vector and vec_range per SUGGESTION2 and combine with returns. If vector sparse, ts_backfill(intraday_price_vector,5) could be applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Earnings momentum plus sentiment
results.description: Combine earnings_surprise (ts_backfill 30) and social_sentiment (vec_avg if vector) per SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION2. Used two datafields only. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Insider buying signal
results.description: Use insider_flow (sparse) with ts_backfill(insider_flow,90) and price returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6: insiders informative but infrequent.

results.idea: Dispersion pick: high idiosyncratic vol and positive company momentum
results.description: Combine realized volatility (from ts_std_dev of returns) and company returns. SUGGESTION1 used single field close-derived measures. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Sector-rotational momentum (sector-relative return)
results.description: Use group_neutralize on returns to get sector-relative signal per KEEP_IN_MIND4 (group used as parameter). SUGGESTION1: two inputs (close and sector group). Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Order-flow imbalance: buy vs sell volume vector avg
results.description: Used order_flow_vector with vec_sum per SUGGESTION2 to capture net buys. If coverage low, ts_backfill(order_flow_vector,10). SUGGESTION1 applied with price. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum times quality (low leverage)
results.description: Combine leverage (or debt_to_equity) and momentum. Debt ratios often sparse -> ts_backfill(debt_to_equity,90). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Price-to-sales mean reversion
results.description: Use ps_ratio (fundamental) backfilled ts_backfill(ps_ratio,90) and short-term negative returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High insider selling = negative short-term alpha
results.description: Use insider_flow (backfilled) and returns (SUGGESTION1). Conservative confidence 0.49; insider selling less predictive than buying.

results.idea: Option skew acceleration as breakout predictor
results.description: Use option_skew (sparse) with ts_backfill(option_skew,30) and returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Earnings estimate revisions growth
results.description: Combine analyst_eps_revision rate and long-term momentum. Analyst fields may be sparse -> ts_backfill(analyst_eps_revision,60). SUGGESTION4: chose analyst field. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Low float momentum: accelerate when low float and rising volume
results.description: Used float_shares (fundamental) with volume. Float often stable; if sparse use ts_backfill(float_shares,90). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Growth surprise compound: revenue surprise * price momentum
results.description: Used revenue_surprise (backfilled 30) and returns. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by institutional ownership changes
results.description: Combine institutional_flow (vector or series) with returns. If institutional_flow sparse, ts_backfill(institutional_flow,60). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High momentum + low analyst coverage (niche momentum)
results.description: Use ts_returns(close,60) and analyst_coverage (sparse, backfill 90). Aim to capture niche stocks overlooked by analysts. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after big move and volume spike
results.description: Combine ts_max_diff to detect large moves and volume zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum in earnings momentum stocks (two-step)
results.description: Combine recent earnings_surprise (backfill30) and 12-week returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum neutralized by size (size-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Use market_cap group via group_neutralize on returns to remove size effect. SUGGESTION1 applied with group. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Reversal after low turnover
results.description: Use turnover and short-term returns; low turnover stocks tend to mean-revert after rare moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Price momentum scaled by earnings quality (accruals)
results.description: Combine accrual_ratio (backfilled) with momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum tilt by cashflow yield
results.description: Use cashflow_yield (fundamental backfilled) times returns. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Volatility breakout using realized vols vector avg
results.description: intraday_vol_vector with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 and breakout returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Pair trade: price spread zscore between two related tickers
results.description: Use price series of A and B and ts_zscore of spread. SUGGESTION1 applied (two datafields). Kept operators small. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-asset carry: interest differential * equity return
results.description: Combine fx_carry (or yield_diff, backfilled) and equity returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Short-term reversal using overnight gap
results.description: Use overnight_return (close/open) and next-day reversal signal. Single-field derived; SUGGESTION1 limited. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum with option open interest confirmation
results.description: Combine ts_returns(close,20) with option_open_interest (backfilled 20). SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High buy-side upgrades vs downgrades momentum
results.description: Use analyst_upgrade_delta (sparse) backfilled and returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Earnings momentum controlled for sector
results.description: group_neutralize earnings_surprise-driven returns by sector (KEEP_IN_MIND4). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Pairs mean-reversion on valuation spreads
results.description: Use pe_ratio spread between peer A and B, ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum moderated by analyst dispersion
results.description: Use analyst_dispersion (backfilled) and returns so high dispersion lowers conviction. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Macro-sensitivity tilt: beta-adjusted momentum
results.description: Use beta (to market) backfilled and momentum, scaling by 1/beta to favor low-beta momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by insider buying intensity vector
results.description: Use insider_trades_vector with vec_sum per SUGGESTION2 and returns; backfill if sparse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Reversal after high option implied vs realized vol divergence
results.description: Combine option_implied_vol and realized vol (ts_std_dev returns) to find divergence; use reverse to mean-revert. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum in small-cap growth stocks
results.description: Combine market_cap (bucket/group) and momentum; group_neutralize to isolate small-cap effect. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Price reversal after abnormal order imbalance
results.description: Use order_imbalance (vector or series) backfilled and immediate return reversal. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Momentum with low analyst coverage weight (discoverability)
results.description: Prefer stocks with high momentum and low analyst_coverage (backfilled). SUGGESTION1/3/4 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion after option gamma spikes
results.description: Use option_gamma (sparse) backfilled and reversal on returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum combined with improving gross margin
results.description: Combine gross_margin change (backfilled quarterly) with price momentum. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Earnings momentum weighted by institutional ownership increase
results.description: Combine earnings_surprise (ts_backfill 30) and institutional_ownership_change (backfill). SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by free cash flow yield
results.description: Use fcf_yield (backfilled) times momentum to favor cash-generative firms. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Social buzz breakout: web_traffic vector avg times momentum
results.description: Used web_traffic_vector with vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 and price returns. If vector sparse apply ts_backfill(web_traffic_vector,7). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum with low short interest (reduced squeeze risk)
results.description: Combine momentum and low short_interest (backfilled) to avoid squeeze risk. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Valuation momentum: rising PEG ratio reversal
results.description: Use peg_ratio (backfilled) and reversal on recent run-up. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by decreasing analyst dispersion
results.description: Prefer stocks where analyst_dispersion decreases (backfilled) and momentum strong. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Reversal after high-day-of-week move
results.description: Use ts_step to detect day-of-week and reverse recent returns on extreme weekday moves. SUGGESTION1 partial. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Momentum controlled by cash conversion cycle improvements
results.description: Combine cash_conversion_cycle delta (backfilled) with momentum per SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High-frequency sentiment vector averaged into short-term alpha
results.description: Use sentiment_vector with vec_avg (SUGGESTION2) and short returns. Backfill if sparse. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum after buyback intensity increases
results.description: Use buyback_rate (backfilled) and momentum to capture supply shock. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Reversion after extreme earnings revision divergence
results.description: Compare current analyst_eps_revision to its ts_mean and reverse extreme moves. SUGGESTION1 applied and used ts_av_diff. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum across earnings seasons (earnings momentum calendar)
results.description: Boost momentum around earnings dates using earnings_calendar flag and ts_returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Liquidity-provided momentum: rising turnover confirms trend
results.description: Combine ts_returns and turnover zscore; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by negative accruals (quality)
results.description: Prefer stocks with rising negative accruals (quality) combined with momentum. Backfill accruals. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Implied volatility term-structure steepening signal
results.description: Use short-term and long-term implied vol difference (option_iv_short - option_iv_long) and mean-revert returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by positive revisions in revenue estimates
results.description: Combine rev_estimate_revisions (backfilled) with momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Reversion after large analyst sentiment divergence
results.description: Detect large change in analyst_consensus (backfilled) and reverse short-term returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by low leverage (conservative momentum)
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse leverage (backfilled). SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short squeeze early warning: rising short_interest & rising put open interest
results.description: Combine short_interest (backfilled) and option_put_oi (backfilled) and returns to detect squeeze potential. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum in high ROE and improving margins
results.description: Combine roe (backfilled) and gross_margin_delta with momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum fade after extreme intraday vector swings
results.description: Use intraday_price_vector and vec_range to penalize extreme intraday swings from momentum bets. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Momentum confirmed by decreasing borrow availability (hard to short)
results.description: Use borrow_rate or borrow_avail (backfilled) with momentum to avoid short squeeze risk. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings drift adjusted for sentiment momentum
results.description: Combine earnings_surprise (backfilled) and social_sentiment_vector vec_avg. SUGGESTION1/2/3. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum boosted by buy-side correlated flows (ETF flows)
results.description: Use etf_flow (series backfilled) and stock momentum; SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Reversal after large analyst target price downgrades
results.description: Use analyst_target_change (backfilled) and reverse short-term runups. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum in names with increasing institutional ownership
results.description: Combine institutional_ownership_change (backfilled) and returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Cross-sectional momentum with winsorized volume filter
results.description: Use ts_returns(close,20) and winsorize(volume) to reduce outliers per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with group-neutralized industry effect
results.description: group_neutralize ts_returns by industry to remove sector concentration (KEEP_IN_MIND4). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after liquidity shock measured by vec_stddev of intraday volumes
results.description: Use intraday_volume_vector with vec_stddev (SUGGESTION2) and reversal on returns. Backfill if needed. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted for recent buyback announcements
results.description: Use buyback_announcement_flag with returns (trade_when) to boost trades only on announcements. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Earnings pre-announcement drift: detect positive pre-announcements
results.description: Use pre_earnings_revision (backfilled) and short-term momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum limited to stocks with improving cashflow trends
results.description: Combine cashflow_delta (backfilled) and returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Volatility-targeted momentum (hump to reduce turnover)
results.description: Use ts_decay_linear or hump to limit turnover and scale momentum by realized vol. Applied KEEP_IN_MIND2 to keep operators low. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum with group-scale to avoid group overweights
results.description: Use group_scale on returns by sector to equalize sector exposures (KEEP_IN_MIND4). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by declining accounts receivable (quality)
results.description: Combine ar_delta (backfilled) with momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Price momentum confirmed by rising analyst target price revision
results.description: Use analyst_target_delta (backfilled) times momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum in names with improving employee sentiment vector
results.description: Use employee_sentiment_vector with vec_avg and returns. SUGGESTION2 applied. Backfill if needed. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion after large mutual fund flows
results.description: Combine mutual_fund_flow (backfilled) and immediate return reversal. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum with decreasing insider selling pressure
results.description: Combine insider_selling_delta (backfilled) and momentum; prefer names with falling selling. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Carry trade within equities: dividend yield * momentum
results.description: Combine dividend_yield (backfilled) and momentum per SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low market-impact (high float, low spread)
results.description: Use float_shares and bidask_spread to favor liquid momentum trades. Backfill if necessary (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by positive YOY revenue growth
results.description: Combine yoy_revenue_growth (backfilled) and momentum. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after unusually low analyst coverage increases
results.description: Detect sudden analyst coverage increases (backfilled) and reverse recent moves to capture mispricing. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Momentum favored in firms with rising gross profit margins
results.description: Combine gross_margin_delta (backfilled) with momentum. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum confirmed by option call open interest growth
results.description: Use option_call_oi (backfilled) and returns to confirm bullish options flow. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Reversion after extreme analyst target dispersion
results.description: Use analyst_target_dispersion (backfilled) and reverse one-day moves when dispersion spikes. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Momentum within low-beta stocks for defensive alpha
results.description: Use beta (backfilled) to favor low-beta momentum names. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by recent repurchase acceleration (vector or series)
results.description: Use repurchase_rate_delta (backfilled) and returns. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized analyst revisions
results.description: Winsorize analyst_eps_revision (to reduce outliers) then multiply by momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Short-term mean-reversion on extreme intraday trade imbalance vector
results.description: Use trade_imbalance_vector with vec_sum to detect imbalances and reverse next-day returns. SUGGESTION2/3 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Momentum moderated by falling operating leverage (quality)
results.description: Combine operating_leverage_delta (backfilled) with momentum; falling leverage improves sustainability. SUGGESTION1/3. Confidence 0.56.
